sql_mapping.insert: insert into mq_answer (question_id, title, description, value, created_date, modified_date) values (#question_id#, '#title#', '#description#', #value#, '#created_date#', '#modified_date#')
sql_mapping.update: update mq_answer set question_id=#question_id#, title='#title#', description='#description#', value=#value#, modified_date='#modified_date#' where answer_id=#answer_id#
sql_mapping.select: select count(answer_id) total from mq_answer where #conditions#

select a.*, z.total_answers from mq_answer a inner join ( select a.answer_id, count(user_id) total_answers from mq_answer a left join mq_user_answer ua on ua.answer_id=a.answer_id where a.question_id in (#question_ids#) group by a.answer_id ) z on z.answer_id=a.answer_id
